rating_comment: Great place & wonderful host. Felt right at home & the host was always responsive & willing to help us if he had any queries or had issues with something. Such a cooperate host is rare these days & definitely a place I’d recommend with such good value.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
This place was exactly what I was looking for. It is conveniently located near shops and food. Transportation options are within a few minutes walks. Uber and Food Panda pickup/deliver to the address. Place is located on a quiet street. Check-in was very quick and so smooth that it was over before I knew it. Caretaker walked me through all of the questions I had like WiFi password and access. Host has a convenient sheet of passwords, laundry, location info etc. the place was spotless and the A/c worked great. Host has other places available as well so send a message if this place is not available. Host replies very quickly. I will stay at those places again the next time I am in Dhaka.
Phil
USA

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2024,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: Very responsive host. Unlike most Bangladeshi hosts, Ahmed's place was free of stupid rules and restrictions. I felt right at home. Had a couple of issues but they were resolved almost immediately. There's a fresh market a few minutes walk away loaded with fresh veg, fish and meat. The apartment is spacious. Plenty of hot water. A/C worked fine. I mostly used Uber cars and had no issue finding the place.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: I had a wonderful stay at this place! The check-in process was incredibly easy and hassle-free. The workstation provided was great for getting some work done. Plus, the absence of mosquitoes was a pleasant surprise and made my stay even more comfortable. The host was also very proactive, ensuring that everything was in order and readily available to assist with any questions or concerns. The location was also very convenient. Overall, I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a comfortable, convenient, and proactive host.

info: Rating, 3 stars,  · February 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: A flat is very big and has some additional empty rooms. Wifi wasn't working on first night by host fixed it very was and it was working okay. A bed was very hard. Bathroom has mold on the doors. Kitchen was a bit dirty. Plus for filtered water. We had problems to come back from the city to the apartment because no one wanted to ride that far. We used metro + two different rikshas.
